rows.label: tev000501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, hey there, [ST:playername ].
I was just thinking about you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0002
rows.name:
I haven't had an assignment with any real meat on it
for a long time. I can almost feel my skills melting
away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0003
rows.name:
So if you've got anything you could use my help with,
I'd be thrilled to lend a hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Gwin to your team.

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Gwin's request for now.

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm good to go whenever, and I'll do whatever!
Can't ask for more than that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Aw, really? Well, if you ever need me,
just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Noctilum, huh? Plenty of BLADEs have gone into that
dark forest and never come back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0011
rows.name:
I don't know how much help I'll be, but if you're willing
to give me a shot, you'll get my best![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0031
rows.name: Add Gwin to your team.

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0041
rows.name: Decline Gwin's request for now.

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Great! We'll make it out alive if I've got anything to
say about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0013
rows.name:
Aw, really? Well, if you ever need me,
just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0019
rows.name:
I just got orders for my next urgent assignment.
Seems I'm being sent to Oblivia with Lieutenant Irina.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Apparently that region's rife with dangerous unidentified
indigens AND Ganglion outposts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0021
rows.name: I'd better try hard not to get in anyone's way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Man, I'm going to need a lot more experience in the
field before Irina trusts me to watch her back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0027
rows.name:
So would you please take me on your next assignment?
Pleeeease? There's so much I need to learn![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0051
rows.name: Add Gwin to your team.

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline Gwin's request for now.

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0028
rows.name: Oh, thanks! I'll do my best not to get in your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0029
rows.name:
Aw, really? Well, if you ever need me,
just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0034
rows.name: We barely have any time left on our mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0035
rows.name:
We gotta reclaim the Lifehold Core before our
mimeosomes burn out and take our lives with 'em,
you know? ...Er, so you'll let me help with that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0071
rows.name: Add Gwin to your team.

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline Gwin's request for now.

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0036
rows.name: Oh, thanks! I'll do my best not to get in your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0037
rows.name:
Aw, really? Well, if you ever need me,
just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0042
rows.name:
I guess they're searching around the Pathfinders' base.
I've got a bad feeling about this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0043
rows.name:
But I suppose all we can do is keep banging out
assignments, one after the other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0044
rows.name:
Your next job is in Sylvalum, right?
Think I could tag along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0091
rows.name: Add Gwin to your team.

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline Gwin's request for now.

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0045
rows.name: Oh, thanks! I'll do my best not to get in your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0046
rows.name:
Aw, really? Well, if you ever need me,
just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0051
rows.name:
Lieutenant Irina had a lot of respect for Lao as
a BLADE. She said she trusted him with her life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0052
rows.name: I can't imagine what she's going through right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0053
rows.name:
If we find Lao and make him listen to reason, he might
still be able to stop all this. So come on! Take me with
you, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0111
rows.name: Add Gwin to your team.

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline Gwin's request for now.

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0054
rows.name:
I'm sure if we just explain to Lao what he's done,
he'll finally realize... I mean, even he has to be
capable of understanding how wrong he was![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0055
rows.name:
Aw, really? Well, if you ever need me,
just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0060
rows.name:
Man, I can't wait to taste some of Lin's cooking with
my real body![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0061
rows.name:
We have to get to the Lifehold Core.
We have to be the ones who reclaim humanity's future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0131
rows.name: Add Gwin to your team.

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline Gwin's request for now.

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0062
rows.name:
I'm a lot better at this than I used to be. You'll see.
You won't ever have to worry about me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0063
rows.name:
Aw, really? Well, if you ever need me,
just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0068
rows.name:
On our last mission together, Lieutenant Irina
totally ordered me to watch her back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0069
rows.name:
I have to start working a whole lot harder.
I have to make sure I'm worthy of her trust![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0070
rows.name:
Please, I'll go with you anywhere. I'll do anything.
I just need more experience so I can get stronger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Gwin to your team.

rows.label: tev000501_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000501_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Gwin's request for now.

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0071
rows.name: Oh, thanks! I'll do my best not to get in your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000501_MSG0072
rows.name:
Aw, really? Well, if you ever need me,
just say the word.[ST:wait ]
